org.usfirst.frc.team2077.video.core

Class CompositeView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc.team2077.video.core.CompositeView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VideoView

    public class CompositeView
extends java.lang.Object
implements VideoView
    A container for one or more RenderedView components.

    This is a simpler and lighter weight for combining multiple source renderings into a view for display only. Add more...

    Â© 2018

    Author:
    FRC Team 2077, R. A. Buchanan
